p: Whole-genome sequencing data are available at the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA) ( https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena), under accession number PRJEB29233. Nanopore sequencing data for strains Nig8/13 and BL16188 are separately available under run accession numbers ERR2259086 and ERR2259087. All finished assemblies are publicly available from PubMLST ( https://pubmlst.org/bigsdb?db=pubmlst_neisseria_isolates) under the accession numbers presented in Table S1 (available with the online version of this article).
